# vastdata_administrator_realm (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "vastdata_administrator_realm" "vastdb_realm" {
  name         = "vastdb_realm"
  object_types = ["nic", "viewpolicy"]
}

# ---------------------
# Complete examples
# ---------------------


resource "vastdata_administrator_realm" "vastdb_realm" {
  name         = "vastdb_realm"
  object_types = ["nic", "viewpolicy"]
}

# --------------------


data "vastdata_tenant" "vastdb_tenant" {
  name = "default"
}

resource "vastdata_administrator_realm" "vastdb_realm" {
  name         = "vastdb_realm"
  object_types = ["nic", "viewpolicy"]
  tenant_id    = data.vastdata_tenant.vastdb_tenant.id
}

# --------------------
```
